description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Hunter of Love" mini-game!
I'm the best hunter in the forest. When it comes to handling a bow, there's no one better than me.
And the prey I'm aiming for now is a beautiful yet courageous lady.
Shoot an apple placed on your head with my bow? Haha, that's a piece of cake. Leave it to me.
Along with the apple, let me also capture your heart!
name: Additional mini-game "Hunter of Love"
